response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, it's valued at $8,000 by us. Considering its immense potential impact on your projects, I would like to extend this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $7,200. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an exceptional value, allowing you to experience the full benefits of our product at a reduced cost. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about how this product can specifically meet your needs.", "product_price": 7200}
